titles.title: American Hospital Preservation Act of 1999
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to revise the update factor used in making payments to PPS hospitals under the Medicare Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 10/20/1999--Introduced. American Hospital Preservation Act of 1999 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to reduce for FY 2000 through 2002 the market basket percentage based update factor used for purposes of determining payment for prospective payment system (PPS) hospitals for inpatient hospital services.
